headline: 2 Investment-Grade Baby Bonds For You And Me
summary: Fixed-income investments offer immunity against everyday market sentiment and the news cycle, along with +6.5% yields. Read more on baby bonds that offer steady income.

headline: KKR: leads financing for West Star acquisition
summary: KKR announced that funds and credit accounts managed by KKR acted as lead investors in a debt financing for the acquisition of West Star Aviation by Greenbriar Equity Group. NB: pmt -1.9%.Since its...
